p: Among FRI episodes with an identified virus, the proportion that were not followed by a FRI episode decreased more gradually than that among FRI episodes without an identified virus ( Figure 3A). Relative protection against a subsequent FRI episode was also observed for AdV- positive versus AdV-negative episodes ( Figure 3B) and likewise for FluV infections ( Figure 3C); all 3 results were statistically significant at P < .001. However, no significant relationships were observed for CoV, ERV, hMPV, hPIV, and RSV ( Supplementary Figure 1).
